Text: RE Rough Estimate of Costs For Possible TW MAOP Upgrade Mainline Loop Lines Sta to Colorado River Cc Max As an alternative to replacing pipe can we consider applying Armour Plate wrap Peter Eur Ing Peter R Stark CEng BSc BA MSc MIM SenMWeldI MIMarE MICorr Tel Fax Original Message From Brown Max Sent Monday May AM To David L NRON Keller John Gottsponer Morgan Hyatt Kevin Asante Ben Stark Peter R Crump Michael Cc Craig Rick Jolly Rich Smith Rick Roensch David Bailey Arnie Subject Rough Estimate of Costs For Possible TW MAOP Upgrade Mainline Loop Lines Sta to Colorado River As I will be out of town at Gallup NM this week for the excavations planned for TW L line I will will miss the the meeting on the th I have begun preparation of a cost estimate for the above given it is very rough and I am awaiting information from Facility Planning which should fine tune some of these numbers As we do not know exactly what we will plan to do at this time this is just a best guess but gives a reference of what might be expected As can be seen replacement of the mainline valves and replacement costs for the Class pipe are the highest drivers We are still uncertain whether the valves on the launchers and receivers are rated for psig and have not been included at this time for replacement I will check on this while in the Gallup area All of the valves requiring replacment will have some salvage and reuse value for potential use on other pipeline systems in ETS that will need to be converted to being smart piggable in the future I am quite sure If there are other alternatives later defined in lieu of pipe replacment for class pipe this would also drive this cost down Anyway its a start File TW MAOP UpgradeCost Estimatexls Max
